vulner.title: Remote Code Execution
vulner.short_description: A potential Remote Code Execution was detected.
vulner.description: An attacker can execute arbitrary code.
vulner.how_to_fix: Utilize proper authentication and authorization mechanisms.

vulner.title: Local File Inclusion
vulner.short_description: A potential Local File Inclusion was detected.
vulner.how_to_fix: Limit the resources available to the application.

vulner.title: Cross-Site Scripting
vulner.short_description: A potential Cross-Site Scripting was detected.
vulner.how_to_fix: Sanitize all user inputs and outputs.

vulner.title: Denial of Service
vulner.short_description: A potential Denial of Service was detected.
vulner.how_to_fix: Utilize proper authentication and authorization mechanisms.

vulner.title: Path Traversal
vulner.short_description: A potential Path Traversal was detected.
vulner.description: The application is susceptible to denial of service attacks.
vulner.how_to_fix: Ensure proper memory management techniques are applied.
